lyrics:
38 contributorshaiku lyricsverse 1
i have been trying
to write a haiku for you
some things i just cant do
maybe youre beyond
ancient asian poetry
or maybe its just me

refrain
i have been trying
to get this haiku just right
all night for you alright
im through

verse 2
maybe this poem
was lost in the sauce we spilled
that never got refilled
ive never thought much
of formulaic verse anyway
and rhymes are not my fortâ€“

refrain
i have been trying
to get this haiku just right
all night for you alright
im through
you might also likechorus
im trying not to try too hard
but youre hard to write down right
so i pen these trite attempts
at haikus for you tonight

verse 3
la da dee diddum
lada da dum doo diddle
dum doo la dee do
there thats sufficient
i wrote a haiku for you he wrote a haiku for you
well i tried at least
and thats not so bad im working here
can that be said for you

chorus
im trying not to try too hard
but youre hard to write down right
so i pen these trite attempts
at haikus for you tonight

outro
words dont work like webster says
they trip me up all night
im just trying to write for you
but youre hard to write down right11embed
